name: Camper News
body:
Camper News

Objective:

Build a CodePen.io app that successfully reverse-engineers this: http://codepen.io/MarufSarker/full/ZGPZLq/.

User Stories

1. As a user, I can browse recent posts from Camper News. 2. As a user, I can click on a post to be taken to the story's original URL. 3. As a user, I can see how many upvotes each story has. 4. As a user, I can post a comment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
